title: A song of death through love
author: Mason Griswold
poem: Time will not fix my wounds
A view with you would cure my disease
I don't want to be scared
I don't want to be scared
Where did I die as you
Time will not fix my wounds
A view with you would cure my disease
I don't want to be scared
I don't want to be scared
Where did we die to him
Why would we die to him
I don't want to be scared
I don't want to be scared
